trans-unit.source: Consume a Machine Learning Web Service from Excel | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Consume a Machine Learning Web Service from Excel | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Consume an Azure Machine Learning Web Service from Excel
trans-unit.target: Consume an Azure Machine Learning Web Service from Excel

trans-unit.source: Consuming an Azure Machine Learning Web Service from Excel
trans-unit.target: Consuming an Azure Machine Learning Web Service from Excel

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Studio makes it easy to call web services directly from Excel without the need to write any code.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Studio makes it easy to call web services directly from Excel without the need to write any code.

trans-unit.source: Steps
trans-unit.target: Steps

trans-unit.source: Publish a web service.
trans-unit.target: Publish a web service.

trans-unit.source: [This page](machine-learning-walkthrough-5-publish-web-service.md) explains how to do it.
trans-unit.target: [This page](machine-learning-walkthrough-5-publish-web-service.md) explains how to do it.

trans-unit.source: Currently the Excel Workbook feature is only supported for Request/Response services that have a single output (that is, a single scoring label).
trans-unit.target: Currently the Excel Workbook feature is only supported for Request/Response services that have a single output (that is, a single scoring label).

trans-unit.source: Once you have a web service, click on the **WEB SERVICES** section on the left of the studio, and then select the web service to consume from Excel.
trans-unit.target: Once you have a web service, click on the **WEB SERVICES** section on the left of the studio, and then select the web service to consume from Excel.

trans-unit.source: On the **DASHBOARD** tab for the web service is a row for the **REQUEST/RESPONSE** service.
trans-unit.target: On the **DASHBOARD** tab for the web service is a row for the **REQUEST/RESPONSE** service.

trans-unit.source: If this service had a single output, you should see the **Download Excel Workbook** link in that row.
trans-unit.target: If this service had a single output, you should see the **Download Excel Workbook** link in that row.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Download Excel Workbook**, and open it in Excel.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Download Excel Workbook**, and open it in Excel.

trans-unit.source: A Security Warning appears; click on the **Enable Editing** button.
trans-unit.target: A Security Warning appears; click on the **Enable Editing** button.

trans-unit.source: A Security Warning appears.
trans-unit.target: A Security Warning appears.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **Enable Content** button to run macros on your spreadsheet.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **Enable Content** button to run macros on your spreadsheet.

trans-unit.source: Once macros are enabled, a table is generated.
trans-unit.target: Once macros are enabled, a table is generated.

trans-unit.source: Columns in blue are required as input into the RRS web service, or **PARAMETERS**.
trans-unit.target: Columns in blue are required as input into the RRS web service, or **PARAMETERS**.

trans-unit.source: Note the output of the RRS service, **PREDICTED VALUES** in green.
trans-unit.target: Note the output of the RRS service, **PREDICTED VALUES** in green.

trans-unit.source: When all columns for a given row are filled, the workbook automatically calls the scoring API, and displays the scored results.
trans-unit.target: When all columns for a given row are filled, the workbook automatically calls the scoring API, and displays the scored results.

trans-unit.source: To score more than one row, fill the second row with data and the predicted values are produced.
trans-unit.target: To score more than one row, fill the second row with data and the predicted values are produced.

trans-unit.source: You can even paste several rows at once.
trans-unit.target: You can even paste several rows at once.

trans-unit.source: Now use any of the Excel features (graphs, power map, conditional formatting, etcetera) with the predicted values!
trans-unit.target: Now use any of the Excel features (graphs, power map, conditional formatting, etcetera) with the predicted values!

trans-unit.source: Sharing your workbook
trans-unit.target: Sharing your workbook

trans-unit.source: In order for the macros to work, your ACCESS KEY needs to be part of the spreadsheet.
trans-unit.target: In order for the macros to work, your ACCESS KEY needs to be part of the spreadsheet.

trans-unit.source: That means that you should share the workbook only with entities/individuals you trust.
trans-unit.target: That means that you should share the workbook only with entities/individuals you trust.

trans-unit.source: Automatic updates
trans-unit.target: Automatic updates

trans-unit.source: An RRS call is made in these two situations:
trans-unit.target: An RRS call is made in these two situations:

trans-unit.source: The first time a row has content in all of its **PARAMETERS**
trans-unit.target: The first time a row has content in all of its **PARAMETERS**

trans-unit.source: Any time any of the **PARAMETERS** changes in a row that had all of its **PARAMETERS** entered.
trans-unit.target: Any time any of the **PARAMETERS** changes in a row that had all of its **PARAMETERS** entered.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
